task.title: Rename the None classification key
task.shortdesc: Steps that describe how to rename a non-classified key that displays as none in reporting.

step.cmd: Using the importer, export classifications to a local file.
Add a row to the file, and type ~none~ in the Key column.
In the row you added, type the more descriptive name in the appropriate classification column(s).

info.p: To follow the example in this documentation, you might type "non-mobile campaign" in a column named Mobile Campaign Name.

stepresult.p: This entry renames None to non-mobile campaign in the Mobile Campaign Type report.

step.cmd: Import the data back into the system.
